text.section: In this section, "medical review committee" has the meaning stated in § 1-401 of the Health Occupations Article.

A person who acts in good faith and within the scope of the jurisdiction of a medical review committee is not civilly liable for any action as a member of the medical review committee or for giving information to, participating in, or contributing to the function of the medical review committee.
